title: Updated Chic Community! High End Finishes!
posting_body: Community Amenities: Club House, Perimeter Fence, Outdoor Grills, Pool, Gated Entrance, Bus stop, Fitness Center, Business Center, Free WiFi Areas, Picnic area, Zen Room for Meditation or Yoga, Limited Access Gates, Fire Pits and Outside Kitchen, Clothes Care Center
